author: mirichmo
body:
We need to make the [TPA list](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/powershell-native/nativemsh/pwrshcommon/pwrshcommon.cpp#L670) for pwrshplugin.dll able to automatically pick up assembly additions to PowerShell Core without a recompile.

Ideal: it automatically trusts all assemblies in $PSHOME
Less ideal: It reads the TPA list from a file and uses that
Current: The TPA list is hard-coded into pwrshcommon.cpp
title: Dynamically Generated TPA List for pwrshplugin.dll
